title: Zoey Deutch
summary: Zoey Francis Thompson Deutch (/dɔɪtʃ/ DOYTCH; born November 10, 1994)[1] is an American actress and producer. Deutch is a daughter of director Howard Deutch and actress-director Lea Thompson. She gained recognition for her roles in the film Everybody Wants Some!!, Netflix comedy series The Politician, and the Netflix film Set It Up.
